name: Mefi OS
description:
Welcome to Mefi OS, Or Mefi's Desktop game. this is a collection of my works for you to explore.

Current build is 0.0.3

1.0.0 means full release

0.1.0 means a chunk of content was completed

0.0.1 means I added something to the game
